name: FastClass Cross-Platform CAD Library
short_description: Will be a C++ library for writing extensions for CAD applications, e.g., CADKey and AutoCAD.  Could also be used as the native API for an opensource CAD program.  Extensions written for any supported platform should be easily ported to another.
